title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: John Wick
description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanosâ€™ actions and restore order to the universe.

title: The Hobbit
description: A reluctant hobbit sets out to reclaim a treasure from a dragon.

title: Matrix Reloaded
description: Neo and the rebel leaders estimate they have 72 hours until Zion falls under siege.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological tests.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman general sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in a bitter rivalry that leads to tragic consequences.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A group of people visit a theme park filled with cloned dinosaurs, but things go terribly wrong.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a simple man who witnesses and influences several defining historical events in America.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption through acts of common decency.
